name: Black and White (Rompkins)
description:
*I’m hearing that some players can jump infinitely right away, if this is the case, hit R during gameplay and then restart the game, this should reset progress and fix that issue*

Press the Space Bar or either Mouse Button to jump. Avoid obstacles and collect money to upgrade your jump!

When Black you will face larger obstacles more frequently. They will also grow larger and come at you at a faster rate and money will not appear as often.

When White your obstacles will be much more manageable and you will see money more frequently.

Now in my late 30's, I'm really just starting to recognize the privilege I have as a straight, white, male and how all of our experiences in life are so dependent on chance, like a roll of the dice.

I built this game to start conversations, so please let me know how it makes you feel and of course, share screenshots of your record breaking runs!

Thanks for stopping by.
